column1: Smoque BBQ////I'll preface this review witha couple of facts about myself:  I was born in Houston
column2: TX and lived between there and Dallas
column3: TX until I was 16 at which point my family moved to Charlotte
column4: NC where I stayed until age 21.  I went to college in Wilmington
column5: NC (far east NC) and lived there for 11 years.  My younger brother and his family live in Savannah
column6: GA.  My father was on a BBQ team in TX for years before I was born and several years after.  I know BBQ.
